topic.title: Tularemia Possible Exposure Location And Type Act - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1617)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1618)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="413350009" Finding with explicit context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1619)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1626)

SHALL contain [1..1] qualifier, SHALL contain [1..1] name/@code="246090004" Associated finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC, SHALL contain [1..1] value/@code="PHC818" Tularemia exposure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.114222.4.5.274 PHIN VADS code system) STATIC (CONF:1620)

SHALL contain [1..1] qualifier, which SHALL contain [1..1] name/@code="408729009" Finding context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC, SHALL contain [1..1] value/@code="410590009" Known possible (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC (CONF:1623)
SHALL contain [1..*] participant, which SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) STATIC (CONF:1627)
MAY contain [0..*] participant, which if present SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="DIR" Direct target (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) STATIC (CONF:1637)
MAY contain [0..*] participant, which if present SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="DIR" Direct target (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) STATIC (CONF:1645)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1617)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1618)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="413350009" Finding with explicit context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1619)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1626)

SHALL contain [1..1] qualifier, SHALL contain [1..1] name/@code="246090004" Associated finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC, SHALL contain [1..1] value/@code="PHC818" Tularemia exposure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.114222.4.5.274 PHIN VADS code system) STATIC (CONF:1620)

SHALL contain [1..1] qualifier, which SHALL contain [1..1] name/@code="408729009" Finding context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC, SHALL contain [1..1] value/@code="410590009" Known possible (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC (CONF:1623)
SHALL contain [1..*] participant, which SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) STATIC (CONF:1627)
MAY contain [0..*] participant, which if present SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="DIR" Direct target (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) STATIC (CONF:1637)
MAY contain [0..*] participant, which if present SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="DIR" Direct target (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) STATIC (CONF:1645)
